name: Yohavahana

product_details.head: CUB offers easy scheme for purchase of four-wheelers in a speedy manner
li: CUB offers four-wheelers loans for NEW vehicles
Eligibility : Salaried :Monthly Salary not less than Rs.50000 ; For Self Employed/Professionals Income not less than Rs.3.00Lakhs
Loan amount : Maximum of Rs. 25.00 Lakhs
Click here for Interest rate and required documents
